main.name: Joshua Chai
main.bio: Aspiring software engineer with a strong foundation in full-stack development. Experienced in building Python-based tools for clinical research and digital health. Passionate about using technology to support healthcare innovation. Strong communication skills and a proven ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description:
1. Adapted to a medical research setting and communicated with clinical researchers to understand requirements and workflows.
2. Built Python tools to automate file renaming, format conversion, normalisation, and merging of large CSV datasets derived from ophthalmic images, reducing manual handling time and errors.
3. Developed visual summary tools using Python to help researchers track processing progress.

work.title: Committee Member & Project Tech Leader
work.description:
1. Participated in strategic planning and decision-making for community tech initiatives.
2. Helped coordinate team operations, recruitment, and internal communications.
3. Designed the overall architecture of the RoboDrone competition website, coordinating the development of key modules such as the public-facing UI, admin interface, and dynamic leaderboard.
4. Create and manage GitHub Issues, breaking down tasks into frontend and backend components for team members.
5. Guide developers in implementing scalable solutions and ensure project goals align with stakeholder expectations.

work.title: International Student Ambassador
work.description:
1. Developed strong cross-cultural communication skills, fostering collaboration in diverse teams.
2. Represented StudyPerth at key student events, enhancing public speaking, networking, and leadership abilities.

education.school: Heilongjiang University of Science and Technology

education.degree: Certificate of Achievement in the Digital Media and IT Program

projects.title: Sleep Matters
projects.description: “Sleep Matters” is a digital sleep log platform built as a patient-facing PWA with React on the frontend and Firebase as the backend.

projects.title: RoboPro
projects.description: “RoboPro Leaderboard” is a web-based leaderboard platform for the 2025 Drone Competition & STEM Festival at Murdoch University.

projects.title: Health Data Analysis
projects.description: Developed ML models to analyse global health data, transitioning from classification to clustering techniques.

projects.title: Smart Pet Feeder
projects.description: An IoT system that automates water refilling and monitors pet health using Raspberry Pi and sensors.
